oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Radical Based Strategy toward the Synthesis of 2,3-Dihydrofurans from Aryl Ketones and Aromatic Olefins
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NAVEEN, T
KANCHERLA, R
MAITI, D
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: PALLADIUM-CATALYZED SYNTHESIS
ONE-STEP CYCLIZATION
SUBSTITUTED DIHYDROFURANS
FACILE SYNTHESIS
ENOL ETHERS
TETRASUBSTITUTED 2,3-DIHYDROFURANS
FUNCTIONALIZED 2,3-DIHYDROFURANS
ENANTIOSELECTIVE SYNTHESIS
STEREOSELECTIVE NITRATION
1,3-DICARBONYL COMPOUNDS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A copper-mediated annulation of aryl ketones with a wide range of aromatic olefins has been developed. This strategy allowed convenient access to 2,3-dihydrofuran derivatives. The versatility of the protocol is shown by synthesizing a-methyl dihydrofurans, which serve as an intermediate for the synthesis of vitamin B1. In addition, the applicability of the protocol in conjugated systems is demonstrated. A radical pathway was presumed and supported for annulation of aryl ketones with olefins.
